attributes.action: Protect our rural countryside SAY-NO to HS2 and find an alternative solution.
attributes.additional_details: This Goverment states any Transport Issues must reflect any enviromental issues, yet I agree businessess need far more support on easier access on transport to save cost and time. Sadly not only has the Goverment ignore the concerns of many rural communities and their councils and respected individuals, it seems the HS2 will go ahead and rip through some of the best countryside we have. I ask them to reconsider the financial cost and permanent damage they will do to these areas which will never be return again to their glory. It the last chance to stop the HS2  Rail link.
